name: Headed Home
description:
This is a block-pushing puzzle game where you must help several little aliens to rebuild their ships so they can return home! The game features 10 different levels, each trickier than the last!

===================================

CONTROLS

[W][A][S][D] keys to move

[R] to Restart a Level

[Q] to Undo your moves

[Enter] to Skip opening cinematic

For the duration of the game jam, I've decided to leave you this control as well. There's a lot of games to try out, so if you get stuck, don't feel bad about skipping a level or two to save some time. (I promise, though, all levels are 100% possible.)

[Enter] - Skip a level

===================================

This game was made for Nokia 3310 Jam 3. The goal behind the jam was to make a game that could have feasibly been found on a Nokia 3310 - this includes the limitations of only two colors, limited inputs, monophonic sound, and an overall resolution of 84x48 pixels.

The optional theme was "ON/OFF" which I chose to incorporate by including gates that could be turned on and off that may block or aid the player depending on the level. 

This was a solo effort and I used each of the following:

All code and graphics - GameMaker Studio 2

Music - Nokia Composer

Sound Effects - The Nokia Sound Pack, provided by the hosts of the game jam
